articles.title: About This Workshop
articles.contents:
The purpose of this workshop is to elicit expert knowledge on the current geographic range of established invasive species that will be used to project future range shifts or expansions over time. Blah blah blah
For any further information regarding this workshop and how these results will be used, please contact xxxx at zzzz.

articles.title: Invasive Species Expert Elicitation Workshop
articles.description:
April 27-28, 2022
University of Florida, Gainesville, FL
articles.contents:
This expert elicitation workshop will seek knowledge from a range of experts on the expected habitat suitability and geographic range of occupancy for up to 20 invasive species throughout the southeastern US. Responses will be aggregated among participants to create weighted composites of expected species occurrence at present and into the future. This workshop is supported by ABC funding sources and is hosted by XYZ people and organizations.
Invited participants will provide their insight on invasive species habitat suitability and occupancy through an interactive web application created with R Shiny.

articles.title: Workshop Itinerary
articles.contents:
April 27, 2022
9:00 - 10:00     Welcome and introduction  10:00 - 10:15     Coffee break  10:15 - 12:00     Discuss big ideas about invasive species  12:00 - 1:00     Lunch  1:00 - 3:00     Contribute responses via Shiny app 

April 28, 2022
9:00 - 10:00     Review all responses  10:00 - 11:00     Discuss whether these products make sense  11:00 - 12:00     Wrap-up and next steps
